name: TWR2_All_Factions_Playable
short_description:
Unlocks ALL factions as playable in Total War: Rome II and offers a starting foundation for all factions.

UPDATE: 
Patch4Beta hit. Patch4Beta STARTPOS and PACK files updated.

FEATURES:
1) CAMPAIGN SELECTION screenshots completed for ALL factions, NOW including Rhodos!
2) Nomadic Faction Group completely finished, both descriptions and traits!

Current Progress: Faction descriptions and effect bundles wrap up for factions, that's it. Finis!

Team:
Izanagi11 - original creator of "factions_playable" PACK and STARTPOS

TuranianGhazi (nomadicai7)  - creative lead on Faction Traits version, with all custom ui graphics and text

den5104: Added many factions to Izanagi's initial versions. 

Umbrecht: Faction Description content creator helper. Working from A down the alphabet. At B now. 
Meanwhile, TG/NAI7 started work from Z on up, at R now.

Freyera: Faction Descriptions from middle of alphabet.

GMoon777: Unlocking, fleshing out Rhodos
summary: Total War Rome II ALL FACTIONS PLAYABLE Modification
